plot: When Antia leaves her hometown her best friend Iria feels betrayed. Years later, Antia comes back for visiting and when she meets with Iria they both feel the same but something has changed...
title: Illa Pedra
plot_es: When Antia leaves her hometown her best friend Iria feels betrayed. Years later, Antia comes back for visiting and when she meets with Iria they both feel the same but something has changed...
